title: Northern ILCA Championship
description: SSSC are hosting the Northern ILCA Championships 14/15th May 2022
body:
SSSC  are hosting the Northern ILCA Championship which will also form part of the Lakeland & Borders Regional Series which consists of the following events:- 

23rd April                 Killington

*7th May                   Annandale+*

*14th & 15th May     South Shields ILCA Regionals*

*21st May                  Beadnell#*

*28th May                Bassenthwaite*

25th June               Tynemouth#

9th July                  Kielder#

13th August          Blackpool and Fleetwood

*27th & 28th Aug  St Mary’s Loch – Super Grand Prix*

*10th Sept              Solway+*

*17th September   Coniston*

24th September  Ullswater

*1st October          Derwent Reservoir#*



\* = Lake district mini series – best 3 to count

+= Borders mini series – best 2 to count

\#= NE mini series – best 3 to count Nb Any sailor who takes part in the Super Grand Prix

[To enter click here!](https://www.myclubhouse.co.uk/SSSC/Events/Calendar/View?id=643)
